description: A surreal painting of a dark silhouette figure and a black cat, both crying into a sink. The background is orange with a swirling abstract painting on the wall.
Two figures embracing. One is a black, skeleton-like figure, the other is a blue figure made of clouds with tears streaming down its face. Background is a fiery orange.
A cute, smiling yellow star character floating in a dark purple space background with planets. Very positive and lighthearted vibe.
A skull resting on the ground with palm trees growing out of its eye sockets. The background is a turbulent, swirling orange and red sky.
A skull with palm trees growing out of its eye sockets, similar to slide_4, but with a calm blue sky background.
